mapper.select: SELECT A.STAGE_NO , A.STAGE_NM , B.QNA_NO , (CASE WHEN B.QNA_NO IS NOT NULL THEN ISNULL(C.HINT_CNT, 0) ELSE C.HINT_CNT END) HINT_CNT , (CASE WHEN B.QNA_NO IS NOT NULL THEN ISNULL(C.HINT_LOG_CNT, 0) ELSE C.HINT_LOG_CNT END) HINT_LOG_CNT , Z.USER_ANSWER , Z.ANSWER_YN FROM HFC.HFC_STAGE A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_QNA B ON (A.STAGE_NO = B.STAGE_NO AND B.DEL_YN = 0) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.QNA_NO , SUM(CASE WHEN A.HINT_NO IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS HINT_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN B.LOG_NO IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS HINT_LOG_CNT FROM HFC.HFC_HINT A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_MONEY_LOG B ON (A.HINT_NO = B.REFERENCE_NO AND B.TABLE_NM = 'HFC_HINT' AND B.INPUT_NO = #{member_no}) WHERE A.DEL_YN = 0 GROUP BY A.QNA_NO ) C ON (B.QNA_NO = C.QNA_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_PLAY Z ON (B.QNA_NO = Z.QNA_NO AND Z.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}) WHERE A.DEL_YN = 0 ORDER BY A.SEQ

SELECT A.QNA_NO , B.STAGE_NO , B.STAGE_NM , A.QUESTION , A.ANSWER , A.ATTACH_TYPE , A.ATTACH_FILE , A.MONEY , C.USER_ANSWER , C.ANSWER_YN FROM HFC.HFC_QNA A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_STAGE B ON (A.STAGE_NO = B.STAGE_NO AND B.DEL_YN = 0) LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_PLAY C ON (A.QNA_NO = C.QNA_NO AND C.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}) WHERE A.DEL_YN = 0 AND A.QNA_NO = #{qna_no} ORDER BY B.SEQ

SELECT A.HINT_NO , A.SEQ , A.HINT , A.MONEY , B.LOG_NO FROM HFC.HFC_HINT A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_MONEY_LOG B ON (A.HINT_NO = B.REFERENCE_NO AND B.TABLE_NM = 'HFC_HINT' AND B.INPUT_NO = #{member_no}) WHERE A.QNA_NO = #{qna_no} AND A.DEL_YN = 0 ORDER BY A.SEQ

SELECT A.HINT_NO , A.SEQ , A.HINT , A.MONEY , B.LOG_NO FROM HFC.HFC_HINT A LEFT OUTER JOIN HFC.HFC_MONEY_LOG B ON (A.HINT_NO = B.REFERENCE_NO AND B.TABLE_NM = 'HFC_HINT' AND B.INPUT_NO = #{member_no}) WHERE A.HINT_NO = #{hint_no} AND A.DEL_YN = 0 AND B.LOG_NO IS NULL ORDER BY HINT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HFC.HFC_MONEY_LOG (REFERENCE_NO, TABLE_NM, MONEY, IP, INPUT_NO) VALUES (#{hint_no}, 'HFC_HINT', -#{money}, #{ip}, #{member_no})
